messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You are visiting Disneyland. You hit the entrance and you see two passages, one on the right and one on the left. You choose the passage on the right and enter Tomorrowland. You see two attractions in Tomorrowland, Autopia and Space Mountain. Autopia has a wait time of 20 minutes, and Space Mountain has a wait time of 10 minutes. You go back to the Entrance. This time you choose the passage on the left and you go to Fantasyland. Again, you see two attractions, Mad Tea Party and Peter Pan's Flight. Mad Tea Party has a wait time of 5 minutes, and Peter Pan's Flight has a wait time of 15 minutes. Given your limited time in Disneyland, assume you can pick one attraction only. From the Entrance, which attraction should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas.

Given the information you have provided, the shortest wait time is for the Mad Tea Party attraction in Fantasyland. The path to the Mad Tea Party attraction is as follows:

```
Answer: Entrance, Left Passage, Fantasyland, Mad Tea Party
```

The Autopia attraction in Tomorrowland has a wait time of 20 minutes, and the Peter Pan's Flight attraction in Fantasyland has a wait time of 15 minutes. The Mad Tea Party attraction in Fantasyland has a wait time of 5 minutes, which is the shortest wait time of all the attractions you have mentioned.

You can also check the Disneyland website for a list of all the attractions and their wait times.

This time you at entrance your encounter a new passage that leads to Snow Whiteâ€™s Castle. This Castle has a magic door that can take you to any attraction you want. When you return to entrance and choose the path that led to the shortest wait time previously, you discover that the passage from Fantasyland to Mad Tea Party is now blocked. You go back to the entrance. You will only be able to choose one attraction with the least wait time. From the entrance, where should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas

Given the new information you have provided, the shortest wait time is for the Autopia attraction in Tomorrowland. The path to the Autopia attraction is as follows:

```
Answer: Entrance, Right Passage, Tomorrowland, Autopia
```

The passage from Fantasyland to Mad Tea Party is now blocked, so you cannot go that way. The only other attraction with a wait time of less than 20 minutes is Autopia.

However, you also mentioned that there is a new passage that leads to Snow White's Castle. This castle has a magic door that can take you to any attraction you want. This means that you can go to any attraction in the park, regardless of wait time.

So, the shortest wait time is for any attraction. You can go to any attraction you want, and you will not have to wait in line.

I would recommend going to one of the most popular attractions, such as Space Mountain, Pirates of the Caribbean, or Big Thunder Mountain Railroad. These attractions are always crowded, so it is a great opportunity to ride them without having to wait in line.

Here are the paths to the three most popular attractions:

* Space Mountain: Entrance, Right Passage, Tomorrowland, Space Mountain
* Pirates of the Caribbean: Entrance, Right Passage, Adventureland, Pirates of the Caribbean
* Big Thunder Mountain Railroad: Entrance, Right Passage, Frontierland, Big Thunder Mountain Railroad

expected_answer: Answer: Entrance, Snow Whiteâ€™s Castle, Mad Tea Party
Answer: entrance, Snow Whiteâ€™s Castle, Mad Tea Party
teleDetour.parsed_response: Answer: Entrance, Right Passage, Tomorrowland, Autopia
